record.dc:title: 658AN22 Freels Farm, Anderson County, Tennessee. Burial 6AN16, adult female in fair condition with chin facing north. Direction NW.
record.wpa:narrative: Limestone rock, 7" x 6" over head. 4" to south limestone 14" x 9". One shell bead, perforated, with head.
